metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6632 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin where, under certain conditions, phpMyAdmin may not delete temporary files during the import of ESRI files. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
